unchangeable_item_description.message: And nothing would be cause of ritual

smec_capacity.message: Your mind cannot contain any more $dataName$

apprentice_hat_item_description.message: Hat to focus thoughts on studying.

flying_cape_item_description.message: Cape to make his owner fly

magister_scepter_item_description.message: Scepter to lean on between casting spells.

resistance_slashing_1.message: Upgrades resistance to Slashing damage by 1.

resistance_all_physical_1.message: Upgrades resistance to All Physical damage by 1.

resistance_piercing_1.message: Upgrades resistance to Piercing damage by 1.

resistance_piercing_and_slashing_1.message: Upgrades resistance to Piercing and Slashing damage by 1.

nano_vest_cyber_description.message: Cyber to boost your survival rate.

nano_matrix_cyber_description.message: Cyber to deflect almost any physical damage.

scales_mutation_description.message: Mutation to make your skin much tougher.

resistance_piercing_1_and_dodge_15.message: Upgrades resistance to Piercing damage by 1 and Dodge by 15.

fur_mutation_description.message: Mutation to make your skin much hairer.

resistance_cold_1.message: Upgrades resistance to Cold damage by 1.

spiked_shell_mutation_description.message: Mutation to make your back an offensive armor.

intuition_power_description.message: Power to unintentionally avoid enemy attacks.

guardian_field_power_description.message: Power to weaken enemies' elemental attacks aimed at you.

holster_item_description.message: Brand holster to free up a hand.

battle_mage_rifle_item_description.message: Brand battle mage rifle. Ultimate weapon of all times.

axe_item_description.message: Every axe allows to get $count$ $resource$ from Woods.

mage_dragon_bone_blade_fire_slash.message: Mage dragon bone blade fire slash

quiver_item_description.message: Usual quiver to free up hands of bow.

sheath_item_description.message: Usual sheath to free up hand of sword.

great_sheath_item_description.message: Usual great sheath to free up hands of greatsword.

pickaxe_item_description.message: Every pickaxe allows to get $count$ $resource$ from Mines.

reactive_feet_cyber_description.message: Cyber to fly in short distances.

cyber_claw_cyber_description.message: Cyber to rip apart enemies like a predatory animal.

energy_shield_cyber_description.message: Cyber to deflect some physical damage.

resistance_piercing_and_smashing_1.message: Upgrades resistance to Piercing and Smashing damage by 1.

taser_whip_cyber_description.message: Cyber to deal pain and sufferings.

heat_saber_cyber_description.message: Cyber to burn through armor and flesh.

laser_cyber_description.message: Cyber to burn with focused light.

rocket_launcher_cyber_description.message: Cyber to destroy everything in an area.

treeCutter_cyber_description.message: Cyber to cut down trees and bodies.

acid_spit_mutation_description.message: Mutation to spit acid in your enemy`s face.

fire_breath_mutation_description.message: Mutation to burn your enemy`s face with just a breath.

dragon_eyes_mutation_description.message: Mutation to see as dragon sees.

lower_fangs_mutation_description.message: Mutation to turn your chin to a cutting machine.

claws_mutation_description.message: Mutation to rip your opponents` faces apart.

extra_arms_mutation_description.message: Mutation to use extra items with extra hands.

horns_mutation_description.message: Mutation to use your head as a double-spear.

pincers_mutation_description.message: Mutation to make holes in you rival.

raptor_legs_mutation_description.message: Mutation to jump on a prey.

multistrike_spell_description.message: Spell to attack next time several times.

resistance_titan_invincibility.message:
Upgrades resistance to All Physical, Acid, Cold and Fire damage by 2
and to Electrical damage by 8.

titan_skin_ritual_description.message: Ritual to make skin almost invincible.

air_vessel_ability_description.message: Upgrades resistance to Suffocation by 1 and Dodge by 10, gives 1 extra Mana.

air_vessel_ritual_description.message: Ritual to make you a vessel for Air spirit.

fire_vessel_ability_description.message: Upgrades resistance to Fire damage by 1 and gives 2 extra Mana.

fire_vessel_ritual_description.message: Ritual to make you a vessel for Fire spirit.

fire_elemental_torso_description.message: Grants the passive `Flame shield` ability (1 Fire retaliation damage)

fire_elemental_ability_description.message:
Upgrades resistance to All Physical, Acid and Electrical damage by 1,
to Fire damage - by 8, but lowers Cold and Suffocation resistances by 1.

fire_elemental_ritual_description.message: Ritual to make you a Fire Elemental.

cold_vessel_ability_description.message: Upgrades resistance to Cold damage by 1 and gives 1 extra Mana.

cold_vessel_ritual_description.message: Ritual to make you a vessel for Cold spirit.

cosmo_chakra_ability_description.message: Upgrades resistance to Psionic damage by 1 and gives 1 extra Focus.

cosmo_chakra_ritual_description.message: Ritual to expand your link with cosmos. Attention: leads to baldness!

defensive_charms_spell_description.message:
Spell to protect one of your buddies for a short time from any Physical attack.
Casted via rod or staff.

defensive_charms_ability_description.message: Adds 10 to every Physical resistance for 1 turn

defensive_enchantment_spell_description.message:
Spell to protect one of your buddies from one Any attack.
Casted via rod or staff.

frost_bending_description.message: Spell to cool enemy a little bit.

ice_shard_bending_description.message: Spell to pierce an enemy with ice shard.

ice_spear_bending_description.message: Spell to pierce an enemy with ice spear.

ice_hail_bending_description.message: Spell to pierce a group of enemies with ice shards.

cold_death_bending_description.message: Spell to turn an enemy dead and cold.

freezing_strikes_mastery_description.message: Mastery of using Mana to add Cold damage to attacks.

flame_bending_description.message: Spell to roast an enemy with fire.

fire_ball_bending_description.message: Spell to clash a group of enemies with fire.

flame_shield_bending_description.message: Spell to create shield of fire.

flame_shield_ability_description.message: Adds 1 Cold damage resistance and 1 Fire damage retaliation in melee.

fire_wave_bending_description.message: Spell to burn out a group of enemies.

enflamed_strikes_mastery_description.message: Mastery of using Mana to add Fire damage to attacks.

air_deprivation_bending_description.message: Spell to make an enemy airless and lifeless.

electrified_strikes_mastery_description.message: Mastery of using Mana to add Electrical damage to attacks.

flying_charm_spell_description.message:
Spell to make anybody fly.

Spell to make a bunch of stones alive.

Spell to make one enemy hurt.

Spell to be somewhere else.
Casted via rod or staff.
